channel.title: natural-language-processing on Balaraman Ravindran
channel.description: Recent content in natural-language-processing on Balaraman Ravindran

item.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
item.description: This course covers the basics of statistical machine learning, with an emphasis on programming exercises and projects. This is usually taught in the Aug-Dec semeter by Dr. Sutanu Chakraborti. I taught this course for the first time in Aug-Dec 2013. Please see the Moodle page for more details.

item.title: Natural Language Processing
item.description: This course gives an introduction to statistical approaches to natural language processing. I teach this jointly with Dr. Sutanu Chakraborti. We offered this course in Aug-Dec 2009 for the first time.
